titlestmt.titleproper: Bisaillon Collection of French Canadians in Connecticut
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Archives & Special Collections Staff.

address.addressline: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center

creation.date: Text converted and initial EAD encoding provided by Apex CoVantage, April 2005

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.repository: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.
did.unittitle: Bisaillon Collection of French Canadians in Connecticut.
did.abstract: Newspaper clippings, genealogies and other literature with information about the history of French Canadians in Connecticut.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of materials relating to Henri Alfred Bisaillon, Beatrice Blanche Audette, the Cyr family, L'Union des Franco-Americains du Connecticut and the Rochambeau- Liberty Ball.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials documenting ethnic communities in Connecticut. See especially, ELLA Records, Peoples of Connecticut Project Records, associated interviews in the Center for Oral History Interviews and the WPA sponsored Ethnic Survey of Connecticut (card file).
For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: This record series is indexed under the following controlled access subject terms.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions on Access
accessrestrict.p: There are no access restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish from these Papers must be obtained in writing from both the University of Connecticut Libraries and the owner(s) of the copyright.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item description, #:#], Bisaillon Collection Of French Canadians in Connecticut. Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center, University of Connecticut Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Materials were donated by Robert Bisaillon.

did.unittitle: Henri Alfred Bisaillon and Beatrice Blanche Audette—50th Anniversary,
